title: 92/452/EEC: Commission Decision of 30 July 1992 establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 30 July 1992  establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community  (92/452/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall import embryos from third countries only if they have been collected, processed and stored by an embryo collection team included in the lists in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 19. 10. 1989, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29. (3) OJ No L 134, 29. 5. 1991, p. 56.
ANNEX
Embryo collection teams approved by the competent veterinary authorities of the following third countries are listed together with the approval number and the name of the team veterinarian.
